title: Season 4, Ep 43 - Egg Kingdom
description:
Chunt finally makes it to the Egg Kingdom, but must contend with the King and his jester before reuniting with Eggy Baby.


Credits

Arnie: Arnie Niekamp

Ghusidore: Matt Young

Chunt: Adal Rifai

King Don Omelette: Jorin Garguilo

Fred Tata: Louie Saunders

Mysterious Man: Tim Sniffen


Producers: Arnie Niekamp, Matt Young, and Adal Rifai

Post-Production Coordination: Garrett Schultz

Editor: Chris Rathjen

Magic Tavern Logo: Allard Laban

Theme Music: Andy Poland


Click HERE for tickets for the upcoming live show at the Bell House (Brooklyn, NY) on October 14th.


You can support the show directly and receive bonus episodes and rewards by joining our Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/magictavern for only $5 per month. Follow us on Twitter and Instagram, and now Patreon!
